page.title: 15A Day On A Farm.
page.content: I am a farmer, I wake up about 6:30am, go down stairs, have some breakfast and then go and get dressed. Then it would be time to milk the cows. The milking process would take place twice a day.The collecting would take place in the morning, but the milk is kept in a large vat which would be refrigarated so that it could be collected any time of day.Before I milked the cows I would feed them first with hay, silage or grass. Then I would go and cut the grass for silage. It can be hard work in the hot weather.I would then go in, sit down and make a plan of a rotation for my farm. I would do a 4 year rotation. First I would grow potatoes,then grain, then grain and last of all I would grow grass.Then I would go in for my lunch. After that I would feed the cows and milk them.
